tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_fitness_data (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    weight DECIMAL(5,2),
    height DECIMAL(5,2),
    activity_level ENUM('sedentary', 'moderate', 'active'),
    target_calories INT,
    target_exercise VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE User (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    age INT,
    gender STRING,
    weight DECIMAL,
    height DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE FitnessLog (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES User(user_id),
    date DATE,
    steps INT,
    calories_burned DECIMAL,
    workout_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE FitnessRecommendations (
    recommendation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES User(user_id),
    recommendation TEXT,
    recommendation_type STRING,
    recommendation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE user_activities (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    activity_name VARCHAR(100),
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    duration INT,
    calories_burned FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    preference_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    fitness_level VARCHAR(20),
    goal VARCHAR(50),
    preferred_activities VARCHAR[],
    schedule JSON
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT NOT NULL,
    height FLOAT NOT NULL,
    weight FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE fitness_activities (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    activity_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    duration_min INT NOT NULL,
    calories_burned FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE user_fitness_history (
    history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    activity_id UUID REFERENCES fitness_activities(activity_id),
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE activities (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    calories_burned INT,
    duration_minutes INT,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE workouts (
    workout_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    workout_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    intensity_level VARCHAR(20),
    duration_minutes INT,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE meals (
    meal_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    meal_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    calories INT,
    protein FLOAT,
    carbs FLOAT,
    fats FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE meal_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    meal_id UUID REFERENCES meals(meal_id),
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    date DATE
)
